description.detailed_description: This font, named "Sketchy Times (48px)" by Exclamachine Type Foundry, is a playful and slightly quirky take on the classic Times New Roman typeface. It features a hand-drawn, sketched aesthetic, giving it a casual and informal feel. The letters are slightly irregular and have a rough, textured appearance, adding a touch of personality and charm. The font includes uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and some basic punctuation marks.
